About Me

I’m a software engineer with a strong passion for clean code. I’m constantly looking for new ways to do things better and learning new practices. In my search, I learned more about Mobile Application development which was a turning point in my career. Later, I moved on to UI Developer and passionately working on the same.

I am most skilled in: Angular and Eating Pizza

Projects

vCard Hub

This is probably one of the greatest apps ever created, if you don't agree you're probably wrong.

I started this project as a way if learning Mobile App Development in IOS and it has since grown into a fully fledged app. I have learned many skills through this and been I’m very proud of having this in my portfolio. If you don’t have a project as awesome as this I would advise you make one.

Established in 1857, Mumbai University is the oldest higher education institution in the India, and is widely regarded in terms of its influence, reputation, and academic pedigree as a leading university in India.

During my time at Mumbai I learnt most of my key skills that have I have taken through my career such as teamwork and working to tight deadlines. I thouroughly enjoyed my time as university and learnt a lot about a healthy work life balance.
